name: Citadel of Sorcery: MMORPG
blurb: Next evolution of the MMORPG.  Novel quality quests, with PnP RPG style personal game play, on a full planet, that changes every day.

Upgraded Keys to 10 LIFETIME All Access Passes to CoS.
_____________________________
Keys to 5 LIFETIME all access passes to all Reflected World sequel games. _____________________________
Two (2) Alpha 'FIRST' keys, giving you early access. _____________________________
Invitation to lunch at our offices in Southern California, with a personal Q&A session with the Lead Designer, and an exclusive Pre-Alpha tour of the game.  You may bring 1 guest, but must provide your own transportation. _____________________________
Physical: Custom CoS jacket, awarded at the lunch tour (you must provide size ahead of time). _____________________________

During Beta you can play test your League Action with members of the development team, plus up to three of your friends. 
_____________________________

Physical: Citadel of Sorcery custom engraved, full size, actual sword.   Be Knighted and receive your sword at the Launch Party. _____________________________ 
Maximize your fun!  You get all the In-game personal character rewards for EACH of 10 lifetime passes! 
_____________________________
In-game: Your own monument at the Heroes Wall with all 10 of your Lifetime pass names on the monument. _____________________________
In-game: Founder's exclusive Great Hall table and chairs, with lighting, for  your Guild Hall or Castle. _____________________________
In-game: Upgrade to two  'Premium' quality Tier 1 Territory maps. 
_____________________________
In-game: Weapon of your choice, with Gift Bag of Premium Tier 2 Charms, Talismans, Gems and Glyphs... in Tier 1!  (never offered again). _____________________________
Drum roll please....     and....
an In-Game, floating in the sky, island, with your own castle!  Includes teleportation portal, and may be used just by you, or you may turn it into the coolest Guild Location...ever.  This will NEVER  be offered in the game.
